akn:section.akn:heading: Reporting requirements for entities receiving grants under the federal recovery act.

akn:content.akn:p: As a condition of the grant or funding, list all jobs that shall be created as a result of the grant or funding on the Department of Employment Services website;
Provide the list required by paragraph (1) of this section to the Department of Employment Services; and

Inform the Department of Employment Services of the number of District residents hired for ARRA-funded positions once the positions created as a result of a grant or funding under the ARRA are filled.
